name: VIDIRO
tag_list: vmap, video-tagging, video-metadata, video-advertising, mid-roll-video-ad, iab, vast, rtb, video-encoding, video-streaming, video-ad-serving-network
overview:
VIDIRO provide technology and services for the automatic tagging of video for mid roll advertising.

VIDIRO deliver increased revenue to video publishers through increased inventory, targeting and engagement.

VIDIRO have 3 products:

VMAP: Video Ad Markers – automatic tagging of the most suitable time points to serve mid roll ads in video (iab VMAP)

VTEXT: Video Transcription – automatic speech and speaker recognition in multiple languages

VTAGS: Video Keywords – automatic keyword generation and video categorisation (iab RTB categories)

Video Publishers can leverage the technology through their Video Platform or Ad Serving provider.

The team at VIDIRO have been working in the online video space for over a decade. Our clients over the years have included broadcasters and online video publishers with whom we have shared the challenges of moving video business online.

The changes in consumer video consumption as audiences move online, specifically how audiences find video and how video advertising technology is evolving, are the things we are most interested in.
